overview: Mr. Mark D. Allsteadt has been with Capital Partners since 2004. Prior to joining Capital Partners, he was a Partner with Saugatuck Capital Company in Stamford, CT. Preceding his involvement at Saugatuck, he was Senior Vice President of Operations with Eye Care Centers of America, Inc. and an operations executive in various positions at Circuit City Stores, Inc. Mr. Allsteadt started his career as an Analyst with RFE Investment Partners, a private equity firm in New Canaan, CT. He has served on the Board of Directors of a number of privately held companies.
